data.Name: Boyles law
data.Description: Grain density is calculated by using the expansion of gas and Boyle's law to determine the grain volume and a scale for mass.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Buoyancy
data.Description: A technique for measuring the bulk volume of a core sample by submerging it in a bath of mercury or other liquid and observing the increase in weight of the bath, following Archimedes principle.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).
